name: Shadowrun: Sprawl Ops - Co-Op Expansion
description:
The Co-Op Expansion introduces a threat that the usually combative teams of shadowrunners within the sprawls of the Sixth World cannot ignore. This turns Shadowrun: Sprawl Ops from a competitive game into a fun cooperative experience where players either work together toward victory or lose together.

From the Sprawl Ops KickStarter description: "This is an exclusive product only, which means it will only be available here on Kickstarter, through the pledge manager and through Catalyst or Lynnvander directly and/or at a variety of conventions while supplies last. This is a limited print product."
